00014 /**
00015  * Testing harness for the CssEventHandler.
00016  * @ingroup querypath_tests
00017  */
00018 class SimpleTestCssEventHandler implements CssEventHandler {
00019   var $stack = NULL;
00020   var $expect = array();
00021   
00022   public function __construct() {
00023     $this->stack = array();
00024   }
00025   
00026   public function getStack() {
00027     return $this->stack;
00028   }
00029   
00030   public function dumpStack() {
00031     print "\nExpected:\n";
00032     $format = "Element %d: %s\n";
00033     foreach ($this->expect as $item) {
00034       printf($format, $item->eventType(), implode(',', $item->params()));
00035     }
00036     
00037     print "Got:\n";
00038     foreach($this->stack as $item){
00039       printf($format, $item->eventType(), implode(',', $item->params()));
00040     }
00041   }
00042   
00043   public function expects($stack) {
00044     $this->expect = $stack;
00045   }
00046   
00047   public function success() {
00048     return ($this->expect == $this->stack);
00049   }
00050   
00051   public function elementID($id) {
00052     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::elementID, $id);
00053   }
00054   public function element($name) {
00055     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::element, $name);
00056   }
00057   public function elementNS($name, $namespace = NULL){
00058     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::elementNS, $name, $namespace);
00059   }
00060   public function anyElement(){
00061     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::anyElement);
00062   }
00063   public function anyElementInNS($ns){
00064     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::anyElementInNS, $ns);
00065   }
00066   public function elementClass($name){
00067     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::elementClass, $name);
00068   }
00069   public function attribute($name, $value = NULL, $operation = CssEventHandler::isExactly){
00070     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::attribute, $name, $value, $operation);
00071   }
00072   public function attributeNS($name, $ns, $value = NULL, $operation = CssEventHandler::isExactly){
00073     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::attributeNS, $name, $ns, $value, $operation);
00074   }
00075   public function pseudoClass($name, $value = NULL){
00076     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::pseudoClass, $name, $value);
00077   }
00078   public function pseudoElement($name){
00079     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::pseudoElement, $name);
00080   }
00081   public function directDescendant(){
00082     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::directDescendant);
00083   }
00084   public function anyDescendant() {
00085     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::anyDescendant);
00086   }
00087   public function adjacent(){
00088     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::adjacent);
00089   }
00090   public function anotherSelector(){
00091     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::anotherSelector);
00092   }
00093   public function sibling(){
00094     $this->stack[] = new TestEvent(TestEvent::sibling);
00095   }
00096 }

00098 /**
00099  * Simple utility object for use with the TestCssEventHandler.
00100  * @ingroup querypath_tests
00101  */
00102 class TestEvent {
00103   const elementID = 0;
00104   const element = 1;
00105   const elementNS = 2;
00106   const anyElement = 3;
00107   const elementClass = 4;
00108   const attribute = 5;
00109   const attributeNS = 6;
00110   const pseudoClass = 7;
00111   const pseudoElement = 8;
00112   const directDescendant = 9;
00113   const adjacent = 10;
00114   const anotherSelector = 11;
00115   const sibling = 12;
00116   const anyElementInNS = 13;
00117   const anyDescendant = 14;
00118   
00119   var $type = NULL;
00120   var $params = NULL;
00121   
00122   public function __construct($event_type) {
00123     
00124 
00125     
00126     $this->type = $event_type;
00127     $args = func_get_args();
00128     array_shift($args);
00129     $this->params = $args;
00130     
00131     print "Event " . $event_type;
00132     print_r($args);
00133   }
00134   
00135   public function eventType() {
00136     return $this->type;
00137   }
00138   
00139   public function params() {
00140     return $this->params;
00141   }
00142 }
